rukus.text: 16|1|allaah ka aadesh aa gaya hai. atah (he kaafiro!) usake sheeghr aane kee maang na karo. vah (allaah) pavitr tatha us shirk (mishranavaad) se ooncha hai, jo ve kar rahe hain.
16|2|vah farishton ko vahî€¼yee ke saath, apane aadesh se, apane jis bhakt par chaahata hai, utaarata hai ki (logon ko) saavadhaan karo ki mere siva koee poojy nahin hai, atah mujhase hee daro.
16|3|usane aakaashon tatha dharatee kee utpatti saty ke saath kee hai, vah unake shirk se bahut ooncha hai.
16|4|usane manushy kee utpatti veery se kee hai, phir vah akasmaat khula jhagadaaloo ban gaya.
16|5|tatha chaupaayon kee utpatti kee, jinamen tumhaare lie garmee[1] aur bahut-se laabh hain aur unamen se kuchhako khaate ho.
16|6|tatha unamen tumhaare lie ek shobha hai, jis samay sandhya ko charaakar laate ho aur jab praatah charaane le jaate ho.
16|7|aur ve tumhaare bojh, un nagaron tak laadakar le jaate hain, jinatak tum bina kade parishram ke nahin pahunch sakate. vaastav mein, tumhaara paalanahaar ati karunaamay, dayaavaan hai.
16|8|tatha ghode, khachchar aur gadhe paida kiye, taaki unapar savaaree karo aur (ve) shobha (banen) aur (allaah) aisee cheezon kee utpatti karega, jinhen (abhee) tum nahin jaanate ho[1].
16|9|aur allaah par, seedhee raah bataana hai aur unamen se kuchh[1] tedhe hain tatha yadi allaah chaahata, to tumasabhee ko seedhee raah dikha deta.
